segments.text: Oh man, this kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there polishing that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing over the sink edge, soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the puddle and doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that rickety stool, stretching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward, and he could fall hard any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just egging him on, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, stealing cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman is so oblivious to all this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
